title: IHC orders to block woman’s CNIC in blasphemy case
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 07 (APP):The Islamabad High Court (IHC) on Monday directed the authorities to block the CNIC of a mysterious character Komal Ismail in cases seeking formation of commission to probe the allegations of blasphemy.
IHC’s Justice Sardar Ijaz Ishaq Khan, hearing the case, remarked that her Identity Card is being blocked until the woman is produced in court.
Last week, the court had ordered the FIA to search for Komal Ismail.
The FIA was of the view that search for Komal Ismail is going on.
The FIA said that the NADRA has verified the girl Iman (Komal Ismail) from its record, shown with the accused in these cases.
